FAQ / OCTGN /

Playing OCTGN

  1. How do I report a bug/ask a question about TFTCG with OCTGN? (Source: Community)
    Any of the following are good places to report bugs or ask questions:
    1. There is a Facebook OCTGN Group.
    2. There is a dedicated Discord server to interact with the TF/OCTGN developer(s).
    3. Many other community Discord servers have OCTGN channels to connect with folk looking to play.
    4. You can report issues and ideas on GitHub.
  2. How do I play a secret action? (Source: Community)
    Hold down shift while you are dragging and dropping the card to the battlefield. This will play the card face-down.
  3. How do I draw an arrow between two cards? (Source: Community)
    Hold down shift, click on the first card, then drag to the second card. This is commonly used to indicate that you are using the first card to attack the seconc card, or that the first card is adding an effect to the second card.
  4. How do I fetch a different Character card? (Source: Community)
    Right click on the character card pile in the bottom right of the screen and select Grab Characters From Collection.
  5. How do I fetch a Battle Card from my collection? (Source: Community)
    Right click on the battlefield right of the screen and select Grab Battle Card From Collection.
  6. Are there pre-existing decks I can play? (Source: Community)
    Yes. Many standard decks are available at https://tftcg.github.io/decks/, while there are lots of community decks available on https://fortressmaximus.io.
  7. Is there any help on using the Deck Editor? (Source: Community)
    Using the Deck Editor is discussed in the article, Grappling the Challenge.
